design_philosophy.core_concept: The Travel Journal - A digital experience that feels like flipping through a curated travel magazine.
principles: Emotion: Warmth over sterility. Use textures and soft tones.
Content: Imagery is the hero. The form is the guide.
Negative Space: Generous padding to create a sense of luxury and ease.

usage_rules: Use 'Playfair Display' for all Section Headings and Hero Text.
Use 'Manrope' for all form labels, inputs, and body text.
Use 'Caveat' sparingly for 'handwritten' notes or accents (e.g., 'Your dream trip starts here').

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Dashboard)
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers.

strategies.wizard_layout: Split Screen: Left 40% (Image/Brand), Right 60% (Form). On Mobile: Top Image (25vh), Bottom Form.
strategies.dashboard_layout: Sidebar Navigation + Card-based Grid Content Area.

buttons.primary: bg-terracotta text-white hover:bg-terracotta/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-stone-100 text-stone-800 hover:bg-stone-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-terracotta text-terracotta hover:bg-terracotta/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-terracotta focus:ring-terracotta rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-stone-800 placeholder:text-stone-400 transition-all shadow-sm
inputs.label: block text-sm font-medium text-stone-700 mb-1.5

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-6

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay on the background (opacity 0.03) to give a paper feel.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border border-white/20 for sticky headers or floating actions.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors (terracotta, sage, sand, etc.) and font families.
4. LAYOUT: Build a 'WizardLayout' component that handles the split-screen logic and image transitions based on the current step.
5. STATE: Use a global state (Context or Zustand) to manage the multi-step form data.
6. ADMIN: Build the Admin Dashboard with a separate layout (Sidebar + Content). Use a table component for inquiries.
7. ANIMATION: Ensure every step transition is smooth. Use AnimatePresence from framer-motion.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons (e.g., 'input-destination', 'btn-next-step').
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid warm colors or subtle textures.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Charcoal (#2D2D2D) for text.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the background.
Create reusable UI components in src/components/ui matching the design system.
